about.title: About Olive Tree
about.description: At Olive Tree, we believe real food comes from real farms. That's why we work with trusted local growers across Cyprus to deliver seasonal, sustainable produce straight to your door. Let us take the hassle out of shopping so you can spend more time enjoying fresh, delicious meals with the people you love.

faq.title: Olive Tree — FAQ
faq.subtitle: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our service

deliveryCities.question: Which cities do you deliver to?

customization.question: Can I customise my basket?
customization.answer: Yes — you can specify in the notes section what you want to include or exclude, and we will confirm your total price before delivery.

ordering.question: How do I place an order?
ordering.answer: Simply fill out the order form on our website. Choose your basket, delivery area, and we'll contact you with the final confirmation.

feedback.question: How do I leave feedback or suggestions?
feedback.answer: We love hearing from you! After your order, we'll send a short feedback form. You can also message us directly through the website or email.
